title: Patch 8.3 Internet disconnection
body:
Ever since patch 8.2 my internet has been a little shifty. My internet never disconnect before patch but now in middle of a ranked game or normal game ping goes over 500ms and sometimes disconnects me. I have difficulty playing the game and I am having a hard time of the AFK timers.
I am using TPG 42mb per second wifi it never disconnects. Riot Please help me fix this problem

replies.body: Actually same, i thought it was just my shit net (so i went over to Diablo/GTA with no net issues) TPG says there's nothing out of the ordinary and i check my router regularly to ensure it's still connected, only since 8.3 have i had this issue
